author: aleksandra perisic
text: I won £150 off because I’m a loyal customer and because I uploaded more than 15 items for sale. I’ve sold a lot of items. Anyway, when I applied the code it didn’t work. I’ve asked if they can send me another code or possibly I can pay the full price and they can refund me £150, but they just replied with sorry we can’t help yo. Code is fine and they don’t know why it doesn’t work. I even sent the screenshots where it says code is applied but the amount Hasn’t changed. Anyway they didn’t get back to me. I’m just really disappointed. It’s really not fair. I don’t understand how can a company like that treat customers in such a manner. Also there is a lot of misleading messaging and benefits that later end up not being true. Not to mention they constantly push you to reduce your prices and the commission is just very high. I also had an issue with one of my bags getting lost, but they found it after 3 months of writing and complaining. I’m not saying don’t use it, I sold items on VC, but definitely be very careful.
title: Very disappointed

author: NAZLI
text:
I’m both a seller and buyer and i have experienced the worst with Vestiaire collective .
The first one was with my sold item , there was something wrong with my shipping item actually the website didn’t give me one it said my address is wrong which was impossible i sold other items with that address before.
For 7 days I messaged the support team  2 or 3 times a day and each time at first they tried to blame it on me and when they couldn’t do that they just passed me to the expert team which I doubt they even exist.
At the end the sell got canceled after 7 days, such a disappointment.

The second time , last week , i made a mistake and used Vestiaire again.
This time I ordered a gucci bag .
Everything seemed well and i have waited for my item for almost 5 to 6 days. After that i received a message that my item has given to my guardian so I checked with the lobby but they didn’t receive any package for me , I waited for 2 more days and still nothing mean while I messaged the support group and they tried to blame it on me again.
One week past like that until they accept that my item is lost for real and they would investigate which i know they won’t and my money and the bag is lost forever.
It is not convenient to pass the problem on customers, they area platforms that we trust to sell and buy through them at least they have to take responsibility.

I will keep my distance from Vestiaire from now on.

author: roni
text: Absolutely ridiculous! author: Chi On Lai
text:
Selling at VC is extremely stressful & frustrating so I decided to stop since April.   

My buying experiences VC is OK, there are many friendly sellers I like and they have great & rare items I can’t resist not buying.   

It is the sellers I love, not the VC platform,
therefore I continue shopping at VC! 
I bought 4 items last week from a seller I know well, had purchased many from him before, voila....today VC concluded 2 of the 4 non-compliant because of “odour”?   They are brand new and I trust the seller, VC didn’t consult me first but cancelled the orders......I only found out from the seller VC’s reject the items because of “odour” 

Perhaps VC taking revenge on my previous complaints here?  No matter what, VC is definitely a platform I should stay away!     

I wish the VC sellers I like & buy often from would sell at Grailed which is far far more pleasant than VC!

Updates 19/5/2021:  one of my rejected items #16045362 is now on Express Delivery, don’t know what it means.  In case a VC staff takes a liking to these trousers & tries to snatch it?  I’m following up closely with the seller 🤨

UPDATE  27/5/2021:  item# 16045362—Seller received the trousers back, re-listed it today & let me know immediately when it was online (item# 16366930).   I bought it right away, but when I proceed check out, the trousers are suddenly reserved by a premium member!!  Under VC policy, a Premium member can hold an item for 30mins only, but it has been holding for more than 3 hours now.    Don’t tell me this isn’t an internal dealing!!

author: M M
text:
As a member on VC I sold a skirt. To ship it I wanted to download the shipping label from VC. When the download did not work, I contacted the customer support. They told me "Please do not worry. A new shipping label was sent to your mail address.".
Instead of a new shipping label the mail contained this: "Upon checking on your concern with the Expert Teams, this error means the shipment of the item is not viable or available to the place or the address. For this one, kindly cancel the sale for this one to avoid any future delivery mishaps. Don't worry, our team will contact and inform the buyer about this as well."

After 2 messages that VC did only reply to with a generic sentence, I sent this third message:
"Dear ladies and gentlemen,
a second time you have not answered my my legitamate questions:
"If I cancel this sale I will not only loose the won 100€voucher for having listed 10 itwms (the rule is to not cancel any sales) but it will also look bad on my VC seller performence. 
I do demand a response with a solution for these points so I can cancel the sale without loosing the voucher or seller status."
You told me in your message you had explained the cancelation to the buyer.
The buyer says however, she did never receive any message from VC explaining that VC needs to cancel the sale due to a system error.
In contrary the seller was just told by VC that I was expected to ship the item within the next 2 days!

I will make public that VC uses their members- which generate their income- to cancel sales that need cancelling due to VC's error.

I am expecting your explanation.
Kind regards,
Sarah (REFERENCE 16049116)
title: VC uses members to cancel sale that need cancelling due to VC's error.

author: LindsayBay
text: I had a Chanel Puffer Jacket Item Number 16110734-order number 39389273- that came from customs Monday May 24, DHL was contacted by me to arrange for delivery to my business address well in advance, because of the pandemic we close the office at 4 pm daily. I called DHL with my waybill number to make certain to provide them the office hours in advance and to provide my cell phone number to sign for the package and to make certain I was the only authorized signer. The package was put on the truck Tuesday, May 25th. Wednesday May 26, the package is stating delivered on Vestiare Collective's app. , I didn't receive my jacket, I didn't sign for my jacket and DHL didn't deliver my jacket, so I called them and a gentlemen said all three of my email addresses  do not match up and I am not a customer of them. I stated I purchased a Chanel Puffer coat for a lot of money and I provided the order number, he could not find me by the order number or the tracking number from DHL, he could not find me by my name. My email on the app. is a privatized email I do not understand, nor did I provide, nor is it mine. He asked me to submit some documents, which I did and I have not heard from them in five days, I have not heard from or seen DHL. I am out a ton of funds. Please please do not purchase anything from this company ,w hen I went to do a simple task like print my invoice for my bank, I could not do that. They keep it under lock and key. I am horrified at how this company has treated me, the lack of proper business protocols and processes, the lack of response. Earlier in the week, when I did speak to the rep, he stated if and when an investigation takes place it will be done by DHL and if DHL finds they did not deliver the jacket, DHL will reimburse me, the issue is it says my jacket is delivered on the app. I am sure they are not honest business people. Do not deal with this company, steer clear away from them. Shop anywhere else.

author: Jayte
text:
I always maintain that VC is great when things go smoothly but those occasions are increasingly rare. 

I recently lost one of my Seller badges, for no reason. I complained and the badge was reinstated. Approximately 24 hrs later, it was removed again. 

Yet again, I wrote to VC requesting an explanation and was surprised to receive the following response:

"Dear Marina" (I'm not Marina but I hope Marina, wherever she is, isn't also having a bad time with VC)

"As we checked, your Leather sandals - Cesare Paciotti was tagged as non compliant because the buyer wasn't accepted the negotiations for this item".

I'm sure Cesare Paciotti is great but I've no idea who he is either and I've certainly never owned a pair of his sandals.

"For your Silk straight pants - Dolce & Gabbana we failed to ship this item within the given time frame"

I've never owned a pair of Dolce and Gabbana Pants and I've certainly shipped all sold items within the given time frame.

My seller badge was reinstated after VC accepted their error. They then made a further administrative 
mistake which resulted in ...drumroll, loss of the badge. I'm now caught in a loop of having the badge reinstated/removed due to clerical errors. 

So there you have it - my account has been penalised, initially due to issues on a stranger's account, then due to further clerical error. If that's not incompetence, I don't know what is. I'd hope for better with a free service, I certainly expect better for the considerable VC fees we pay.
title: So bad, you just have to laugh
